channel.title: Steph Huang on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Steph Huang on Artangled

item.title: Steph Huang: Everything and Nothing | mother’s tankstation limited
item.description: Steph Huang, who was born in Taiwan but now lives and works in London, makes sardonic, surprising, and sometimes funny use of everyday objects. A collection of works are on show at mother’s tankstation: several quite modest individual pieces pack a bigger collective punch when imaginatively displayed, together. The artist clearly misses home, but finds quirky pleasures in her new surroundings. The ironically named Forest features bamboo leaves, neatly trapped in a gridded metal mesh.
